meanings.sent1: She repines about the rainy weather.
meanings.sent2: He often repines about his job.
meanings.sent3: The cat repines when it runs out of treats.
meanings.sent4: The old tree repines for the days of abundant sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The child repines for the lost toy with tears in his eyes.

meanings.sent1: She repines for her childhood friends.
meanings.sent2: He repines for the taste of his favorite dessert.
meanings.sent3: The dog repines for the squirrel it can never catch.
meanings.sent4: The bird repines for the freedom of the open sky.
meanings.sent5: The traveler repines for the sights of distant lands.
